title: Slayer monsters

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Slayer monster is a Monster that can only be killed using the Slayer skill. All Slayer monsters have a minimum slayer level requirement and special equipment may be needed to kill them (usually purchased from a Slayer Master). Some monsters can only be killed when on an assignment.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Slayer monsters

A Slayer monster is a Monster that can only be killed using the Slayer skill. All Slayer monsters have a minimum slayer level requirement and special equipment may be needed to kill them (usually purchased from a Slayer Master). Some monsters can only be killed when on an assignment.

Some monsters have alternatives that can be killed and count toward a particular task, see Slayer task.

List of Slayer monsters[edit | edit source]

rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
A '''Slayer monster''' is a [[Monster]] that can only be killed using the [[Slayer]] skill. All Slayer monsters have a minimum slayer level requirement and special equipment ''may'' be needed to kill them (usually purchased from a [[Slayer Master]]). Some monsters can only be killed when on an assignment.

:''Some monsters have alternatives that can be killed and count toward a particular task, see [[Slayer task]].''
